description: Namespace provides a scope for Names. Use of multiple namespaces is optional.

apiVersion.description: The version of the schema for the object representation

kind.description: A string value representing the REST resource

metadata.description: Standard object's metadata. The name must be a valid DNS label no matter it is generated for explicitly provided.

spec.description: Spec defines the behavior of the Namespace.

status.description: Status describes the current status of a Namespace.
